# Investor Relations

AudioEye速 is a Nasdaq-traded platform that ensures ADA and WCAG compliance at scale. It offers easy-to-use technology, continuous monitoring, and automated remediations without altering websites. Trusted by the FCC, Samsung, Tommy Hilfiger, and others.
